welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bet Shemesh, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy the unique blend of ancient and modern attractions this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe Rimon
restaurants.description: Cafe Rimon is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: Hashamen
restaurants.description: Hashamen is a falafel restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Homes Burger
restaurants.description: Homes Burger is a burger joint located in בית שמש.

restaurants.description: Cafe Ne'eman is a café located in Beit     , .Shemesh.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ben Gurion Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, expected to open in 2022 and serve as the main terminal for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international flights to and from Europe and Asia.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
